org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta

Class SmClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.SmElement
      • org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.SmClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MClass

    public final class SmClass
extends SmElement
implements MClass
    A SmClass describes a semantic type, ie a metamodel metaclass.

    Objects managed by the kernel (ie SmObject) are typed by their SmClass associated instance. Therefore, all SmObject instances sharing the same SmClass instance are said to belong to the metaclass defined by SmClass. There is a unique instance of SmClass per meta-class.

    SmClass instances are build at run-time from the Java class that defines their meta-class. The Java reflection API along with Java annotations are used to find out what are the SmAttribute and SmDependency instances to declare on the SmClass instance.

    Meta class annotations are defined in SmaMetaClass.

    • Field Summary

      • getClass

        public static SmClass getClass(short classid)
        Get a SmClass from its ID.
        Parameters:
        classid - the class id.
        Returns:
        the found class

      • getClass

        public static SmClass getClass(String name)
        Get the SmClass instance of a meta class given its name.

        This method DOES NOT create the SmClass instance if it does not already exist.

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the metaclass whose SmClass is to be returned
        Returns:
        a unique SmClass instance for the meta class named name, null if not found.

      • getClass

        public static SmClass getClass(Class<? extends MObject> metaclass)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Get the SmClass instance of a meta class given its interface.

        This method DOES NOT create the SmClass instance if it does not already exist.

        Parameters:
        metaclass - the interface implemented by elements of this metaclass.
        Returns:
        a unique SmClass instance for the meta class named name, null if not found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the class is not an interface.

      • getRegisteredClasses

        public static List<SmClass> getRegisteredClasses()
        Get the list of all the currently registered SmClass instances.
        Returns:
        the list of the currently registered SmClass instances.

      • getSmClassFor

        public static SmClass getSmClassFor(Class<? extends ISmObjectData> dataClass)
        Get the SmClass instance representing a given meta class.

        The meta class must be passed as an annotated Java class defining the meta class structure. This method creates the SmClass instance if it does not already exist.

        Parameters:
        dataClass - the java class defining the meta class data.
        Returns:
        a unique SmClass instance for the meta class, null if the passed java class does not actually define a meta class (bad, missing or inconsistent java annotations)

      • isCmsNode

        public boolean isCmsNode()
        Description copied from interface: MClass
        Tells whether this metamodel class is a CMS node.

        CMS nodes define a structuring unit for some storages implementations. For EXML repositories, a CMS node represents an EXML file.

        Specified by:
        isCmsNode in interface MClass
        Returns:
        true if the class is a CMS node.
